feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 a.m. PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow. High 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023
